name: In Too Deep
text: Give to the Greer Nelson player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Greer Nelson → remove In Too Deep from the game. • Each minion engage3d with you activates against you. If no minions activate this way, In Too Deep gains surge. Discard this card.

name: The Hood
text: Steady. Villainous. [star] Forced Response: After The Hood attacks, place 1 threat on the Criminal Underworld side scheme. (Tigra's nemesis minion.)

flavor: The Hood has gathered the disparate elements of the criminal underworld together in one unified gang.
name: Criminal Underworld
text: Each [[Criminal]] minion cannot take damage.

name: The Hood's Mantle
text:
Attach to The Hood. Otherwise, attach to the villain. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against attached enemy, spend [energy] [physical] resources → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Attach to The Hood. Otherwise, attach to the villain.

name: Madame Masque
text:
When Revealed: Place 2 threat on the Criminal Underwold side scheme. Otherwise, find Criminal Underworld and reveal it.
[star] Boost: Place 2 threat on the Criminal Underworld side scheme. Otherwise, this card gains [boost][boost].

flavor: "Bad kitty!"
name: Jigsaw
text: Quickstrike. [star] Forced Response: After Jigsaw attacks and damages a character, place 2 threat on the Criminal Underworld side scheme.

name: Complicated Lineage
text: Give to the Teddy Altman player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust Teddy Altman → remove Complicated Lineage from the game. • Discard each [[Shapeshift]] upgrade you control. Discard this card.

name: Super Skrull
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Super Skrull attacks you, discard the top card of your deck. If that card's printed resource has: [energy] – Super Skrull gets +2 ATK for this attack. [mental] – Discard 1 card from your hand. [physical] – Give Super Skrull a tough status card. [wild] – Discard an upgrade you control.

flavor: Super Skrull was sent to abduct Hulkling after his true heritage was revealed.
name: Skrull Business
text: Forced Response: After any number of cards are discarded from the top of a player's deck, place those cards facedown under this scheme.

name: Fantastic Powers
text: Attached minion gets +3 hit points and gains retaliate 1. When Revealed: Find Super Skrull. Put him into play engaged with you and attach Fantastic Powers to him. If you are in hero form, Super Skrull attacks you.

name: You're Coming With Me!
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each different resource icon on the discarded cards. When Revealed (Hero): Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Take 1 damage for each different resource icon on the discarded coards ([energy], [mental], [physical], or [wild]).

name: Iron Man
text: [star] Iron Man gets +1 SCH for each [[Tech]] attachment on him (to a maximum of +3 SCH). Setup: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for an Iron Man attachment and your team reveals it.

name: Iron Man
text: Steady. [star] Iron Man gets +1 SCH for each [[Tech]] attachment on him (to a maximum of +3 SCH). When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Iron Man cannot take damage this phase.

name: Iron Man
text: [star] Iron Man gets +1 SCH for each [[Tech]] attachment on him (to a maximum of +3 SCH). When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for an Iron Man attachment and your team reveals it.

name: Iron Man
text: Steady. [star] Iron Man gets +1 SCH for each [[Tech]] attachment on him (to a maximum of +3 SCH). When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Iron Man cannot take damage this phase.

name: Superhero Registration Act
text: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

flavor: "Society will no longer tolerate superheroes who operate outside the law." —She-Hulk
name: Cut Off Support
text: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. Forced Interrupt: When a player reveals a treachery, place 1 threat here. (Limit once per phase per player.)

flavor: Iron Man and his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. That includes former teammates such as Captain America and Spider-Woman.
name: Pro-Registration Tactics
Negative Zone Prison
text: [star] Reduce the target threat value of this scheme by 1 for each facedown card under it. Forced Response: After an ally is defeated by an enemy attack, place that ally facedown under this scheme. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Powered Gauntlets
text:
Attach to Iron Man. [star] Iron Man's attacks gain ranged. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Iron Man, spend [energy] [physical] resources → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Rocket Boots
text:
Attach to Iron Man. Iron Man gains the [[Aerial]] trait. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Iron Man, spend [energy] [physical] resources → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Mark V Helmet
text: Attach to Iron Man and give him a tough status card. Iron Man gains stalwart. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Iron Man, spend [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Arc Reactor
text: Attach to Iron Man and give him a tough status card. Iron Man gains retaliate 1. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Iron Man, spend [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Mark V Armor
text:
Attach to Iron Man. Forced Response: When Iron Man would take any amount of damage, place it here instead. Then, if there is at least 5 damage here, discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Repulsor Blast
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard an upgrade or support you control. When Revealed (Hero): Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. For each printed [energy] and [wild] resource discarded this way, deal 1 damage to your hero.

flavor: "That's it. Now I'm mad!" —Iron Man
name: Supersonic Punch
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Iron Man schemes. If he has a [[Tech]] attachment, you are confused. When Revealed (Hero): Iron Man attacks you. If he has a [[Tech]] attachment, this attack gains piercing.

flavor: Iron Man's vast wealth gives his Avengers a significant advantage over Captain America's outlaws.
name: Stark Tower
text: When Defeated: The enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for an Iron Man attachment and your team reveals it.

name: Yellow Jacket
text:
Toughness. When Revealed: Give the enemy leader a tough status card.
[star] Boost: Give the enemy leader a tough status card.

name: Wasp
text:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme.
[star] Boost: Place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: U.S. Agent
text:
Retaliate 1. Toughness. When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to your identity.
[star] Boost: Deal 1 damage to your identity.

flavor: "Do us all a favor and stay down!" —Doc Samson
name: Mighty Avengers
text: When Revealed: Resolve the "When Revealed" ability of each minion in play. If no "When Revealed" abilities were resolved this way, this card gains surge.

flavor: "We've got you outnumbered and outgunned." —Iron Man
name: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Each [[Avenger]] minion gains the printed keywords of each other [[Avenger]] minion.

name: Doc Samson
text:
Guard. When Revealed: You are confused. If you were already confused, place 2 threat on the main scheme.
[star] Boost: You are confused.

name: Hellcat
text:
Quickstrike. When Revealed: You are stunned. If you were already stunned, take 2 indirect damage.
[star] Boost: You are stunned.

name: Drafted
text: Attached minion gets +2 hit points and gains the [[Avenger]] trait. When Revealed: In competitive mode, the enemy team attaches Drafted to a minion engaged with them and that minion engages you. Otherwise, discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Reveal that minion and attach Drafted to it.

flavor: "Do us all a favor and stay down!" —Doc Samson
name: Mighty Avengers
text: When Revealed: Resolve the "When Revealed" ability of each minion in play. If no "When Revealed" abilities were resolved this way, this card gains surge.

flavor: S.H.I.E.L.D. wants each state to have its own government-sponsored super team.
name: The Fifty State Initiative
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Shuffle each [[Avenger]] minion in the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

flavor: "It's S.H.I.E.L.D.'s mission to protect the world!"
name: Maria Hill
text: Retaliate 2. When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Life Model Decoy and attaches it to Maria Hill.

name: Life Model Decoy
text: The enemy team attaches this card to a minion or their leader. (Limit 1 per character.) Attached character gains stalwart. Forced Interrupt: When attached character would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent that damage and discard this card instead.

flavor: "Stand down, Captain. You are NOT in command here!" —Maria Hill
name: Executive Order
text:
When Revealed: Place 2 threat on each scheme. If Maria Hill is in play, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: If Maria Hill is in play, this card gains [boost][boost][boost].

flavor: S.H.I.E.L.D. exerts influence across the world by deploying its helicarriers.
name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Helicarrier
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: The player who defeated this scheme deals 1 damager to each character they control and each minion engaged with them.

flavor: "Just a bite! We won't kill them!"
name: Venom
text: [star] Venom's attacks gain piercing. When Revealed: Venom attacks your leader. Otherwise, Venom activates against you.

flavor: "This is too rich: I'm working for S.H.I.E.L.D. and Daredevil's the outlaw!"
name: Bullseye
text: When Revealed: The enemy team discards an attachment from your leader. Otherwise, discard an upgrade you control.

flavor: "We're all guilty. This is justice!" —Penance
name: Justice Like Lightning
text: When Revealed: Each minion activates against the player it is engaged with. Otherwise, the enemy leader activates against you. Do not give it a boost card for this activation.

name: Excessive Force
text:
When Revealed: Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each minion in play. Otherwise, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: The enemy leader attacks your leader (after this activation). Do not give it a boost card for that attack.

flavor: "They've all been fitted with explosive implants to ensure their compliance." —Maria Hill
name: Dangerous Recruits
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. Forced Interrupt: When a minion is defeated, give it to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.

name: Captain Marvel
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Energy Channel and attaches it to Captain Marvel. Forced Response: After Captain Marvel attacks and defeats a character, place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

name: Captain Marvel
text: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Captain Marvel cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After Captain Marvel attacks and defeats a character, place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

name: Captain Marvel
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Energy Channel and attaches it to Captain Marvel. Forced Response: After Captain Marvel attacks and defeats a character, place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

name: Captain Marvel
text: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Captain Marvel cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After Captain Marvel attacks and defeats a character, place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

name: Superhero Registration Act
text: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Recruits
text: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] minions and deals one to each player on your team as a facedown encounter card.

flavor: Iron Man and his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. That includes former teammates such as Captain America and Spider-Woman.
name: Pro-Registration Tactics
Hunting Rebel Heroes
text: Each hero gains the [[Unregistered]] trait. Forced Response: After another card is revealed that gives 1 or more heroes the [[Unregistered]] trait, deal 2 damage to each of those heroes. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Energy Channel
text: Permanent. Forced Response: After a leader, hero, or ally attacks Captain Marvel, place 1 energy counter here. Then, if there are at least 4 energy counters here, remove all of them → Captain Marvel attacks that character. This attack gains overkill.

name: Captain Marvel's Helmet
text:
Attach to Captain Marvel. Captain Marvel gains stalwart. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Captain Marvel, spend 3 resources of the same type → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Cosmic Flight
text:
Attach to Captain Marvel. Forced Interrupt: When Captain Marvel would take more than 3 damage from an attack, reduce that amount to 3. Then, discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Photonic Blast
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard an ally or support you control. When Revealed (Hero): Captain Marvel attacks you. Place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

name: Crisis Interdiction
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Captain Marvel schemes. Place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel. When Revealed (Hero): Place 2 threat on each scheme.

name: Energy Absorption
text:
When Revealed: Place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel. Heal 1 damage from Captain Marvel for each energy counter on Energy Channel.
[star] Boost: Place 1 energy counter on Energy Channel.

flavor: "Keep your sensors locked on North America. I want to know the location of Cap's headquarters." —Captain Marvel
name: Alpha Flight Station
text: When Defeated: Place 3 energy counters on Energy Channel.

flavor: S.H.I.E.L.D. formed an elite unit to confront and capture renegade superheroes.
name: Cape-Killer
text: Quickstrike. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Cape-Killer attacks an identity with the [[Unregistered]] trait, it gets +2 ATK for this attack.

name: Unregistered Super
text: Your identity gains the [[Unregistered]] trait. Alter-Ego Action: Discard an identity-specific card from your hand → discard this card.

name: Bring Them In
text: When Revealed: Exhaust each [[Unregistered]] identity. Otherwise, the enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Unregistered Super and deals it to you as a facedown encounter card.

flavor: "Look what happens when you break the law!" —S.H.I.E.L.D. Officer
name: Arrest Order
text: When Defeated: The defeating player deals the topmost [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] minion in the encounter discard pile to themself as a facedown encounter card.

name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Soldier
text:
When Revealed: Put the topmost [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]] minion in the encounter discard pile into play engaged with you.
[star] Boost: Put this minion into play engaged with you.

name: Rapid Response
text: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. If you are in: • Alter-ego form, place threat on the main scheme equal to that minion's SCH. • Hero form, deal damage to your hero equal to that minion's ATK.

flavor: "Stay alert. Cap's Avengers were last seen in this area." —S.H.I.E.L.D. Officer
name: S.H.I.E.L.D. Patrol
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Each minion gains guard.

flavor: "I don't like hunting down our friends, but it's better us than the Thunderbolts."
name: Colleen Wing
text: When Revealed: Choose an ally you control (the enemy team chooses instead if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). Discard that ally.

flavor: "There is no shame in a righteous cause."
name: Shang-Chi
text: When Revealed: Choose an upgrade you control (the enemy team chooses instead if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). Discard that upgrade.

name: Unregistered Super
text: Your identity gains the [[Unregistered]] trait. Alter-Ego Action: Discard an identity-specific card from your hand → discard this card.

flavor: "I'm glad you guys went rogue; it's gonna be a big payday for me." —Paladin
name: Bounty Hunting
text: When Revealed: Discard 1 card from your hand (at random if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each resource icon on that card.

name: Heroes for Hire
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: The enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Unregistered Super and deals it to the defeating player as a facedown encounter card.

flavor: "I'm not in this for your political agenda. I'm in it for the money."
name: Paladin
text: Quickstrike. Toughness. When Revealed: Discard 1 card from your hand (at random if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait).

name: Paladin's Pistol
text: Attack to Paladin. Otherwise, attach to the enemy leader. [star] Forced Interrupt: When attached character attacks, this attack gains ranged and overkill. Discard this card after this attack.

flavor: "I'm glad you guys went rogue; it's gonna be a big payday for me." —Paladin
name: Bounty Hunting
text: When Revealed: Discard 1 card from your hand (at random if you have the [[Unregistered]] trait). Place 1 threat on the main scheme for each resource icon on that card.

flavor: When Captain America took his resistance underground, Iron Man contracted Paladin and the Heroes for Hire to track him down.
name: Government Contractor
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Each identity gains the [[Unregistered]] trait.

name: Superhero Registration Act
text: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

flavor: With armed S.H.I.E.L.D. units patrolling the streets, crime rates have fallen to record lows.
name: Homeland Security
text:
If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero].
Each minion gains guard.

name: Superhero Registration Act
text: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

flavor: "I can't believe Captain America has turned against his country!" —J. Jonah Jameson
name: Public Outrage
text: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. [star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, each player discards the top 3 cards of their deck.

flavor: Iron Man and his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. That includes former teammates such as Captain America and Spider-Woman.
name: Pro-Registration Tactics

flavor: "Wait until they see our plans to protect the midwest." —Yellowjacket
name: The Initiative
text: When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for 1[per_hero] side schemes and deals one to each player on your team as a facedown encounter card. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: Iron Man and his Avengers are ordered to apprehend any superpowered individuals who refuse to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. That includes former teammates such as Captain America and Spider-Woman.
name: Pro-Registration Tactics

flavor: "There's no more amnesty for Cap and his renegades. It's gone too far!" —She-Hulk
name: No Going Back
text: Allies enter play exhausted. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: "I was a double agent for years. There's not much I won't do for a just cause." —Spider-Woman
name: Righteous Cause
text: When Revealed: The enemy leader schemes. If there is more than 1 player on your team, give the enemy leader an additional boost card for this activation.

flavor: "I'm on target. Commence attack." —Captain Marvel
name: Whatever It Takes
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The enemy leader attacks your leader. When Revealed (Hero): The enemy leader attacks you.

name: Targeted Strike
text:
When Revealed: The enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card and deals it to you as a facedown encounter card.
[star] Boost: The card gains [boost] for each player on your team.

name: Choosing Sides
text: Permanent. The enemy leader cannot take more than 2 damage from each attack. Forced Response: After the last threat is removed from here, the enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] encounter cards and deals one to each player as a facedown encounter card. Flip this card.

name: Now It's Personal
text: Give to the first player. Action: Remove this card from the game → each player on your team chooses 2 of your leader's set-aside player cards and adds them to their hand.

flavor: "Just because it's the law doesn't mean it's right."
name: Captain America
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Cap's Shield and attaches it to Captain America. Forced Response: After Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, give him a tough status card.

name: Captain America
text: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Captain America cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, give him a tough status card.

flavor: "Just because it's the law doesn't mean it's right."
name: Captain America
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Cap's Shield and attaches it to Captain America. Forced Response: After Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, give him a tough status card.

name: Captain America
text: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Captain America cannot take damage this phase. Forced Response: After Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, give him a tough status card.

name: Superhero Resistance
text: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

name: Gathering Support
text: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] minions and deals one to each player on your team as a facedown encounter card.

flavor: Captain America and his Avengers are forced to go underground or face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. When Iron Man and Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.
name: Resistance Tactics

flavor: Captain America's Avengers continue to fight crime from their secret hideout.
name: Secret Avengers
text: The enemy leader gets +1 ATK while attacking (+2 ATK instead if the attack is undefended). If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Cap's Shield
text: Permanent. Attach to Captain America. Attached character gains retaliate 1 and attacks against them lose piercing. Forced Response: After a hero or the Captain America leader uses their ATK to attack and damage attached character, attach Cap's Shield to the attacker.

name: Cap's Helmet
text:
Attach to Captain America. Captain America gains stalwart. Hero Response: After you make a basic attack against Captain America, spend 3 resources of the same type → discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Super-Soldier Serum
text:
Attach to Captain America. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Captain America attacks, this attack gains overkill. At the end of this attack, discard this card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

flavor: "Take your best shot!" —Captain America
name: Shield Block
text: When Revealed: If Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, give him a tough status card and a facedown boost card. Otherwise, attach Cap's Shield to him and give him a facedown boost card.

name: Shield Toss
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Captain America schemes. When Revealed (Hero): If Cap's Shield is attached to Captain America, deal 2 damage to each character you control. Otherwise, attach Cap's Shield to Captain America.

name: Heroic Strike
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard an ally or upgrade you control. When Revealed (Hero): Captain America attacks you. If this attack damages a character, stun that character.

flavor: Captain America's stand against the Superhero Registration Act gives other heroes a figure to rally behind.
name: Fearless Determination
text: When Defeated: Attach Cap's Shield to Captain America. He activates against the player who defeated this scheme.

name: Falcon
text:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Defeated: Give this card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.
[star] Boost: You are confused. If you were already confused, this card gains [boost][boost].

name: Hercules
text:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Defeated: Give this card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.
[star] Boost: You are stunned. If you were already stunned, this card gains [boost][boost].

name: Goliath
text:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Defeated: Give this card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.
[star] Boost: Give the enemy leader a tough status card. If they were already tough, this card gains [boost][boost].

name: Freedom Fighters
text:
When Revealed: Resolve the "Boost" ability of each minion in play. If no "Boost" abilities were resolved this way, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: Resolve the "Boost" ability of each minion engaged with you.

flavor: "Tony's team is in for a big surprise!" —Captain America
name: New Avengers
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Shuffle each minion in the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

name: Black Panther
text:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Defeated: Give this card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.
[star] Boost: Exhaust each upgrade you control.

name: Spectrum
text:
Teamwork ([[Avenger]]). When Defeated: Give this card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.
[star] Boost: Exhaust a character you control.

name: Freedom Fighters
text:
When Revealed: Resolve the "Boost" ability of each minion in play. If no "Boost" abilities were resolved this way, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: Resolve the "Boost" ability of each minion engaged with you.

name: Switching Sides
text: When Revealed: Discard an ally you control. In competitive mode, any player on the enmy team may spend resources equal to that ally's cost to put it into play under their control. If no ally left play this way, this card gains surge.

name: Secret Avengers
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: The enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card. Give that card to the enemy leader as a facedown boost card.

flavor: "Once more, the surface-dwellers' war has injured my Atlanteans and the Sub-Mariner must avenge them."
name: Namor
text: Stalwart. Toughness. Villainous. When Revealed: Namor activates against you.

name: Neptune's Trident
text: Attach to Namor. Otherwise, attach to the enemy leader. [star] Attached character's attacks gain piercing. Hero Action: Spend [energy] [physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Horn of Proteus
text: Attach to Namor. Otherwise, attach to the enemy leader. [star] Forced Interrupt: When attached character schemes, give it a tough status card. Hero Action: Spend [mental] [physical] resources → discard this card.

name: Imperius Rex!
text:
When Revealed: If Namor is in play, he activates against you. Otherwise, the enemy leader activates against you.
[star] Boost: Give the activating enemy an additional boost card.

flavor: "There is nothing Namor will not dare or do to defend his people." —Namor
name: Ruler of Atlantis
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Each [[Atlantis]] minion cannot take damage.

flavor: "For Namor and the glory of Atlantis!"
name: Atlantean Guard
text: Guard. When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Atlanteans
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. If you are in: • Alter-ego form, place 1 threat on the main scheme for each different card type discarded this way. • Hero form, take 1 indirect damage for each different card type discarded this way.

flavor: The Atlanteans as a people share a deep mistrust of surface-dwellers and enmity for the pollution of their waters.
name: Atlantis Attacks
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Revealed: Discard the top 1[per_hero] cards of your deck. Place 1 acceleration token here for each different card type discarded this way.

name: Spider-Woman
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Finesse and attaches it to Spider-Woman. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman attacks, she gets +1 ATK for each skill counter on Finesse for this attack. Remove each skill counter from Finesse.

name: Spider-Woman
text: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Spider-Woman cannot take damage this phase. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman attacks, she gets +1 ATK for each skill counter on Finesse for this attack. Remove each skill counter from Finesse.

name: Spider-Woman
text: Setup: The enemy team finds Finesse and attaches it to Spider-Woman. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman attacks, she gets +1 ATK for each skill counter on Finesse for this attack. Remove each skill counter from Finesse.

name: Spider-Woman
text: Steady. When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. Spider-Woman cannot take damage this phase. [star] Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman attacks, she gets +1 ATK for each skill counter on Finesse for this attack. Remove each skill counter from Finesse.

name: Superhero Resistance
text: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

flavor: "Why don't you chase after the REAL bad guys?" —Hulkling
name: Open Rebellion
text: If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero]. Forced Interrupt: When a player reveals a treachery, place 1 threat here. (Limit once per phase per player.)

flavor: Captain America and his Avengers are forced to go underground or face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. When Iron Man and Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.
name: Resistance Tactics

flavor: "Does anyone else see the irony in outlaw heroes fighting crime?" —Chief of Police
name: Neighborhood Protectors
text: When Revealed: The enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for 1[per_hero] side schemes and deals one to each player on your team as a facedown encounter card. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Finesse
text: Permanent. Max 3 skill counters here. Forced Interrupt: When a treachery is revealed, place 1 skill counter here.

name: Contaminant Immunity
text:
Attach to Spider-Woman. Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman would be stunned or confused, discard this card instead. Give her a tough status card.
[star] Boost: Reveal this card.

name: Pheromones
text:
When Revealed: You are stunned and confused. Place 1 skill counter on Finesse.
[star] Boost: You are stunned. Otherwise, you are confused.

name: Venom Blast
text:
When Revealed (Alter-Ego): This card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Spider-Woman attacks you. If this attack removed the following skill counters from Finesse: • At least 1, this attack gains ranged. • At least 2, this attack gains piercing. • At least 3, this attack gains overkill. You are stunned and confused. Place 1 skill counter on Finesse.
[star] Boost: You are stunned. Otherwise, you are confused.

name: Inconspicuous
text:
When Revealed: Chooose: • Discard the highest-cost card you control • Spider-Woman schemes.
[star] Boost: This card gains [boost] for each status card on your identity.

flavor: "I've made a career out of staying one step ahead of S.H.I.E.L.D." —Spider-Woman
name: Self-propelled Glide
text: Forced Interrupt: When Spider-Woman would take damage from an attack, reduce the amount of damage she takes by 1 for each skill counter on Finesse.

name: Spider-Man
text: When Revealed: Spider-Man attacks each character with Tangled Up attached. If no attack was made this way, the enemy team searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a copy of Tangled Up and gives it to you as a facedown encounter card.

name: Tangled Up
text:
Attach to your leader. Otherwise, attach to your hero. Forced Interrupt: When attached character would scheme, thwart, or attack, discard this card instead.
[star] Boost: If the Spider-Man minion is in play, reveal this card.

flavor: "Friendly neighborhood Spider-Man swinging through!" —Spider-Man
name: Spectacular!
text: When Revealed: Place 2 threat on the main scheme. In competitive mode, remove 2 threat from your leader's main scheme.

flavor: "This isn't about politics; it's about saving lives!" —Spider-Man
name: Neighborhood Hero
text: When Revealed: In competitive mode, move 2 threat from your leader's main scheme to this scheme. Otherwise, place 2[per_hero] threat here.

flavor: "You S.H.I.E.L.D. boys better get out of my face."
name: Luke Cage
text:
When Revealed: Stun your leader. Otherwise, you are stunned.
[star] Boost: Stun your leader. Otherwise, you are stunned.

flavor: "I thought I was done with all this superhero crap."
name: Jessica Jones
text:
When Revealed: Confuse your leader. Otherwise, you are confused.
[star] Boost: Confuse your leader. Otherwise, you are confused.

flavor: "Since when is it illegal to save lives?" —Daredevil
name: Protect the Innocent
text: When Revealed: Give the enemy leader and each minion a tough status card. If the enemy leader was already tough, this card gains surge.

name: Street Defenders
text: When Revealed: Each minion activates against the player it is engaged with. Otherwise, the enemy leader activates against you. Do not give it a boost card for this activation.

flavor: The Defenders were formed to protect people often overlooked by the Avengers.
name: The Defenders
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Each minion gains guard.

flavor: "My respect for the law doesn't blind my sense of right and wrong."
name: Daredevil
text:
When Revealed: The enemy team exhausts a character you control.
[star] Boost: Exhaust a character you control.

name: Iron Fist
text:
When Revealed: Iron Fist attacks your leader. Otherwise, Iron Fist activates against you.
[star] Boost: The enemy leader attacks your leader (after this activation). Do not give it a boost card for this attack.

name: Resistance Fighter
text:
Attach to a minion of the enemy team's choice. Otherwise, this card gains surge. Attached minion gets +4 hit points and gains stalwart.
[star] Boost: Attach this card to a minion engaged with you.

name: Street Defenders
text: When Revealed: Each minion activates against the player it is engaged with. Otherwise, the enemy leader activates against you. Do not give it a boost card for this activation.

flavor: "Tell S.H.I.E.L.D. to pull back. This city is under our protection." —Daredevil
name: Defend Hell's Kitchen
text:
Hinder 1[per_hero].
Threat cannot be removed from this scheme while a [[Defender]] minion is in play.

name: Cloak
text:
When Revealed: Place 2 threat on a scheme. In competitive mode, remove 2 threat from your leader's main scheme.
[star] Boost: If Dagger is in play, reveal Cloak. Otherwise, place 1 threat on a scheme.

name: Dagger
text:
When Revealed: Heal 2 damage from the enemy leader. Deal 2 damage to a character you control.
[star] Boost: If Cloak is in play, reveal Dagger. Otherwise, deal 1 damage to a character you control.

name: Darkforce
text: Attach to the enemy leader and give them a tough status card. [star] Forced Response: After attached leader schemes and places threat on the main scheme, remove an equal amount of threat from your leader's main scheme. Discard this card.

flavor: "Maybe my daggers will help them see the light!" —Dagger
name: Lightforce
text: When Revealed: Heal 3 damage from the enemy leader. Take 3 indirect damage.

flavor: Cloak and Dagger were among the first to join Captain America's superhero resistance.
name: Cloak and Dagger
text: Hinder 1[per_hero]. When Defeated: Heal 3 damage from the enemy leader and give them a tough status card.

name: Superhero Resistance
text: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

flavor: Captain America's public denouncement of the Superhero Registration Act drew many allies to his side.
name: Rallying Call
text:
If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero].
Each minion gains guard.

name: Superhero Resistance
text: Contents: Chosen leader I and II (III and IV for expert mode). Chosen leader's set, Standard set, and 3–4 modular sets. Setup: In competitive mode, the enemy team finds the Choosing Sides side scheme and your team reveals it. In cooperative mode, find the chosen leader's side scheme and reveal it.

flavor: "I forgot how exhausting it is to be undercover!" —Spider-Woman
name: Going Underground
text:
If there is more than 1 player on your team, this stage gains hinder 2[per_hero].
The enemy leader gains steady.

flavor: Captain America and his Avengers are forced to go underground or face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. When Iron Man and Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.
name: Resistance Tactics

flavor: The goal of the resistance is to wear S.H.I.E.L.D. down until the Superhero Registration law is overturned.
name: Guerilla Warfare
text: Forced Response: After a status card is placed on the enemy leader, place 1 threat here. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: Captain America and his Avengers are forced to go underground or face arrest for refusing to register with S.H.I.E.L.D. When Iron Man and Captain Marvel start rounding up their superpowered friends, the resistance decides to fight back.
name: Resistance Tactics
Superhero Jailbreak
text: [star] Forced Response: After resolving step 1 of the villain phase, each player discards the top card of the encounter deck. Each player who discards a minion this way puts it into play engaged with them. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: "I was a double agent for years. There's not much I won't do for a just cause." —Spider-Woman
name: Righteous Cause
text: When Revealed: The enemy leader schemes. If there is more than 1 player on your team, give the enemy leader an additional boost card for this activation.

flavor: "I'm on target. Commence attack." —Captain Marvel
name: Whatever It Takes
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The enemy leader attacks your leader. When Revealed (Hero): The enemy leader attacks you.

name: Targeted Strike
text:
When Revealed: The enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for a card and deals it to you as a facedown encounter card.
[star] Boost: The card gains [boost] for each player on your team.

name: Choosing Sides
text: Permanent. The enemy leader cannot take more than 2 damage from each attack. Forced Response: After the last threat is removed from here, the enemy team searches the top 5 cards of the encounter deck for 1[per_hero] encounter cards and deals one to each player as a facedown encounter card. Flip this card.

name: Now It's Personal
text: Give to the first player. Action: Remove this card from the game → each player on your team chooses 2 of your leader's set-aside player cards and adds them to their hand.
